Text:
Can you please crack either or all of these two apps -

"WTV H.264 to TS Converter" or "WTV H.264 to MPEG Converter"

They require the standard activation of a name and serial number.

They can be found here -
http://www.dvr-ms.com/wtv-ts.htm
http://www.dvr-ms.com/wtv-h264-mpeg.htm

Windows Media Center recordings are almost useless to me without converting, and those converters are the fastest by several magnitudes.

Many, many thank you's in advance.
just FYI, LAME 3.98.4 is the recommended version now. otherwise your uploads are excellent, thanks!!!
Stunning Artist.  Thank you for the Up.
